title: Personal Survival Technique
description: Gained essential skills for surviving emergency situations, including hazard assessment, safe evacuation, effective use of survival equipment, and strategies to protect life until rescue.

title: Fire Prevention and Fire Fighting
description: Trained in identifying fire hazards, implementing preventive measures, and executing effective firefighting techniques to ensure safety and minimize risks in emergency situations.

title: Elementary First Aid
description: Trained in providing immediate and basic medical assistance during emergencies, including injury assessment, wound care, CPR, and stabilizing patients until professional help arrives.

title: Personal Safety and Social Responsibilities
description: Trained to developed awareness of safe working practices, risk prevention, teamwork, and effective communication to maintain safety, harmony, and responsibility in diverse and challenging environments.
